H0.text: The Sinai Peninsula is part of which country. Israel

H1.text: The Sinai Peninsula is part of which country. Jordan

H2.text: The Sinai Peninsula is part of which country. Saudi Arabia

H3.text: The Sinai Peninsula is part of which country. EGY

A4.text: The Sinai Peninsula, or simply Sinai, is a peninsula in Egypt, and the only part of the country located in West Asia.
